block_comment: This block of code manages mode selection and enable signals in a synchronous manner. Upon the positive edge of the clock signal, it assigns the values of 'data_mode_sel' and 'addr_mode' to 'data_mode_o' and 'addr_mode_o' respectively. It also checks the condition if 'syn1_vio_addr_mode_value' is 0 and 'vio_modify_enable' is 1, and based on that, it controls the 'bram_mode_enable' signal. If the condition is true, it enables 'bram_mode_enable', otherwise it disables it.
